name: Junior Backend Engineer | Python
description:
ViCueSoft (vicuesoft.com) is looking for a junior Backend engineer who will support backend part of our products. We create professional software for video codec engineers, as well ML-based solutions; among our customers are world leading semiconductor manufacturers and video streaming services.

Your responsibilities as backend developer will include implementation of web-app API, interaction with databases, load balancing and enabling our services in cloud for web- and mobile clients in collaboration with C++ and ML engineers.

Required:

  • Solid Python3 programming skills.
  • Knowledge of Django (Flask) framework; MongoDB (or PostgreSQL) database programs.
  • Experience with version control systems (git).
  • Advanced knowledge of Linux.
  • Intermediate or above English.
  • Readiness to learn basics of frontend development stack.

Optional:

  • Knowledge of containers (such as Docker) and container orchestration systems (Kubernetes).
  • Knowledge of Google Cloud ecosystem (GCP).
  • Experience with HTML, JS, CSS.

Conditions:

  • Official employment in an accordance with the Labour Code.
  • Flexible schedule, you can work on-site or remotely.
  • 32 days paid annual leave.
  • Fitness program.
  • Medical insurance.
